plank.name: Plank
plank.description: Hold a plank position to strengthen your core.
plank.tip: Keep your back straight and engage your core.

squat.name: Squats
squat.description: A great lower-body exercise for strength and endurance.
squat.tip: Keep your knees aligned with your toes.

push_up.name: Push-ups
push_up.description: Strengthen your chest, shoulders, and triceps.
push_up.tip: Keep your body in a straight line and lower yourself with control.

jumping_jacks.name: Jumping Jacks
jumping_jacks.tip: Keep a steady pace and land softly on your feet.

burpee.name: Burpees
burpee.description: A full-body explosive movement for endurance and strength.
burpee.tip: Engage your core and land softly to protect your knees.

lunge.name: Lunges
lunge.description: Strengthen and tone your legs and glutes.
lunge.tip: Keep your chest lifted and ensure your knee doesnâ€™t pass your toes.

mountain_climber.name: Mountain Climbers
mountain_climber.description: A core and cardio movement for endurance.
mountain_climber.tip: Keep your back straight and engage your abs.

high_knees.name: High Knees
high_knees.tip: Lift your knees high and keep a fast pace.

bicycle_crunch.name: Bicycle Crunches
bicycle_crunch.description: A great core workout to strengthen your abs.
bicycle_crunch.tip: Twist your torso and engage your obliques.

downward_dog.name: Downward Dog
downward_dog.description: An inversion pose that stretches the hamstrings and strengthens the arms.
downward_dog.tip: Press your heels toward the floor and lift your hips high.

warrior_1.name: Warrior I
warrior_1.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and opens the hips and chest.
warrior_1.tip: Keep your front knee aligned with your ankle.

childs_pose.name: Child's Pose
childs_pose.description: A resting pose that gently stretches the lower back and hips.
childs_pose.tip: Breathe deeply and relax your shoulders away from your ears.

cat_cow.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
cat_cow.description: A gentle yoga stretch for spinal flexibility.
cat_cow.tip: Move with your breath, inhale on the arch, exhale on the round.

glute_bridge.name: Glute Bridge
glute_bridge.description: Strengthen your glutes and lower back.
glute_bridge.tip: Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.

leg_raise.name: Leg Raises
leg_raise.tip: Keep your lower back pressed against the floor.

arm_circles.name: Arm Circles
arm_circles.description: Strengthen your shoulders with this simple movement.
arm_circles.tip: Keep your arms straight and make controlled circles.

seated_twist.name: Seated Spinal Twist
seated_twist.description: A yoga pose for spinal mobility and digestion.
seated_twist.tip: Sit tall and twist gently without forcing the movement.

triceps_dip.name: Triceps Dips
triceps_dip.description: Strengthen your triceps with this bodyweight exercise.
triceps_dip.tip: Keep your elbows pointed straight back, not out to the sides.

prenatal_pelvic_tilt.name: Prenatal Pelvic Tilt
prenatal_pelvic_tilt.description: A gentle exercise to strengthen the lower back and core for pregnancy.
prenatal_pelvic_tilt.tip: Move with control and avoid excessive arching.

postnatal_kegels.name: Postnatal Kegels
postnatal_kegels.tip: Squeeze and hold, then relax slowly.
